title: Engineering: flue gas analysis (Orsat apparatus)
creator_credit: United States. Office of Education and Audio Productions
brief_description: Setting up the Orsat gas analyzer; drawing in an air-free sample of flue gas; absorbing and measuring the amounts of carbon dioxide, oxygen and carbon monoxide in the sample; and how to calculate the amount of nitrogen.
creator_credit_for_label: United States. Office of Education and Audio Productions
